description: This file defines data models in Kotlin for representing weather-related data structures such as coordinates, location details, current weather, forecast details, and search responses, primarily aligned with backend OpenAPI shapes.

classes.name: Coordinates
classes.description: Represents geographical coordinates with latitude and longitude.

classes.name: Location
classes.description: Contains details about a location, including name, country, state, and coordinates.

classes.name: CurrentWeather
classes.description: Holds current weather data such as temperature, wind, and condition information.

classes.name: CurrentWeatherResponse
classes.description: Wraps the current weather data along with location information as a typical API response.

classes.name: DailyForecastItem
classes.description: Contains forecast data for a day, including date, min/max temperatures, and weather condition.

classes.name: HourlyForecastItem
classes.description: Contains forecast data for a specific hour, including time, temperature, and condition.

classes.name: ForecastResponse
classes.description: Represents forecast data with location, daily, and hourly forecasts.

classes.name: LocationSearchItem
classes.description: Represents a location search result item with optional id and coordinates.

classes.name: LocationSearchResponse
classes.description: Contains a list of location search results.

classes.name: ReverseGeocodeResponse
classes.description: Contains a reverse geocoding result, typically a single location search item.
